author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 216 cases of civil disputes, bank related cases, cheque related issues etc. were settled in the Lok Adalat held here on Saturday. Cumulative compensation of Rs.1,25,40,323 was agreed upon in these cases.

The Lok Adalat was presided over by District Judge G. Dhanaraj. Principal Sub Judge Swarnam J. Natarajan welcomed the participants in the beginning.

Chief Judicial Magistrate R. Naraaja thanked them in the end. Serving and retired legal officers and Annamalai, administrative officer of District Legal Services Authority that organised the event were among the participants.
title: 216 cases of civil disputes disposed of at Tiruvannamalai
